title: Incident Classification
objective: Identify and classify cybersecurity incidents based on type and severity.
task: Study NIST 800-61 categories and apply them to 5 scenarios.
challenge: Classify 5 incidents: phishing, DDoS, insider threat, malware, unauthorized access.

title: Phishing Indicators
objective: Recognize phishing signatures in emails and web traffic.
task: Analyze 3 emails for spoofed domains, urgency language, and malicious links.
challenge: Label key phishing indicators in 3 examples.

title: Initial Log Triage
objective: Conduct basic triage of Windows/Linux log events.
task: Filter noisy logs and identify anomalies using Sysmon.
challenge: Identify 3 suspicious events in raw logs.

title: Email Header Analysis
objective: Trace phishing email source using header inspection.
task: Evaluate SPF/DKIM/DMARC validation.
challenge: Find the forged source in 2 email headers.

title: Network Traffic Monitoring
objective: Monitor and analyze PCAP files for threats.
task: Use a simulated PCAP viewer to scan traffic.
challenge: Spot beaconing or exfiltration behavior.

title: DNS & URL Reputation Checks
objective: Use OSINT tools to validate domain reputation.
task: Check 5 domains through reputation services.
challenge: Flag 3 high-risk URLs.

title: Incident Ticket Documentation
objective: Log incident details in proper documentation format.
task: Write up 2 IR tickets from past examples.
challenge: Submit a sample ticket with summary, timeline, and response.

title: Threat Intelligence Basics
objective: Ingest and analyze threat feeds for IOC extraction.
task: Pull data from 2 public feeds.
challenge: Extract 5 IOCs from threat data.

title: Lateral Movement Detection
objective: Recognize signs of credential theft and lateral movement.
task: Use logs and alerts to trace pivoting behavior.
challenge: Detect 2 examples of lateral movement.

title: Privilege Escalation Triggers
objective: Identify signs of privilege escalation.
task: Analyze two compromised system logs.
challenge: Detect escalation methods (token theft, Sudo abuse).

title: Malware File Detection
objective: Use hashes and scanners to flag known malware.
task: Inspect 3 files and validate against hash databases.
challenge: Report 2 infected files.

title: Host Isolation Procedures
objective: Decide and document when to isolate compromised systems.
task: Review 3 simulated alerts and choose response.
challenge: Justify isolation decisions in each scenario.

title: Command Line Forensics
objective: Gather forensics data from the command line.
task: Run queries to inspect logs, user history, and configs.
challenge: Detect unauthorized user behavior.

title: Memory Dump Inspection
objective: Detect malware or suspicious behavior in memory snapshots.
task: Use a basic Volatility-based viewer.
challenge: Find suspicious PID and DLL injection.

title: Exploit Behavior Mapping
objective: Map observed actions to known exploit techniques.
task: Match behaviors to MITRE ATT&CK IDs.
challenge: Identify 3 exploitation behaviors in logs.

title: IDS Alert Analysis
objective: Validate and triage intrusion detection alerts.
task: Analyze 4 Suricata alerts.
challenge: Mark 2 true positives, 1 false positive.

title: Endpoint Monitoring Setup
objective: Simulate setting up and monitoring an EDR platform.
task: Configure baseline and alerting rules.
challenge: Respond to 2 endpoint alerts.

title: Escalation Chain Simulation
objective: Practice proper escalation procedures.
task: Read and respond as Tier 1 analyst escalating to Tier 2.
challenge: Format an escalation email summary.

title: Lessons Learned Report
objective: Write a final report summarizing containment and recovery.
task: Use prior simulated case to compose closure report.
challenge: Complete all key sections (summary, timeline, lessons).

title: Live Simulation Replay
objective: Handle a full incident with real-time decisions.
task: Go through a 3-part incident story with branching paths.
challenge: Make all correct decisions under time pressure.

title: Final Evaluation & Debrief
objective: Review all skills and export certificate + cover letter.
task: Complete final assessment and reflect on progress.
challenge: Download and save your final documents.
